V1: yes; annual forecast of zebra migration
V4: no, modeling study, not even out of sample validation
V6: I *think* when they say they used predictor variables over teh previous 7-9 days, they really mean they are predicting 7-9 days in advance, making this a real forecast
V10: yes; forecasts w/ time lagged driver variables
V13: to my understanding they do forecast one year (1992)
V15: yes; provide spatial forecasts of invasive species based on native range; this is a textbook chapter but cites an article that I think covers the same material, so might consider swapping one for the other if we are focused on peer-reviewed articles
